example.text: Since Biden’s FIRST day in office, human trafficking into our great nation has skyrocketed to unimaginable numbers. This crisis is about to get much worse. We must restore Trump-era border policies to end this tragedy. [[url]]
The House just last night passed this in a bipartisan way. Hopefully, we will do the same thing later this afternoon.

Spoke with champions for the ALS community last night, including Brian Wallach and Dan Tate. I've been honored to take action and get solutions signed into law to help the ALS community as a co-founder of the Senate ALS Caucus. Next up: the Promising Pathway Act. [[url]]

Left-wing politicians now declaring a state of emergency in Chicago over illegal immigrants in their city is peak irony. They supported open border policies and deserve to reap what they sow. We must restore Trump-era border policies immediately!
We're 2 days from the crisis on our border becoming worse than we can imagine. We need leadership from the White House. [[url]]
Under what criteria were the countries Cuba, Haiti, and Nicaragua selected for this program? Sec.
